law.history: Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 8, effective January 1, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 309, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 106, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 35, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Watercraft assessment, taxation -- Allocation -- Value determination.
